branding.tagline: Stories of Valor, Voices of Veterans

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Personal narratives from war veterans, inspiring stories of wartime resilience, and accounts of homefront support
publishing_focus.target_audience: Veterans and their families, students of history, readers interested in personal narratives
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Gives a voice to the often overlooked personal narratives of war, from veterans to families on the homefront
publishing_focus.example_titles: Memoirs of war veterans, narratives of resistance fighters, accounts of homefront heroes
